name: Nightmare
description: 1 scare per turn for 2 turns. Distance: 6

name: Frighten
description: Target may not move next turn. Distance: 3.

name: Hidden Door
description: All targets may not Scare you next turn.

name: Boo!
description: Scare: 4, Distance: 1. Must be behind target.

name: Sprint
description: 3+ movement. Player is unable to attack this turn.
effect: Running within 1 tile of target causes 1 scare

name: Mirror Image
description:
Duplicate your character for 2 turns. Duplicate can be scared. At the 
end of the 2nd turn, player can move to either location.

name: Ward
description:
Leave at your location. Ward can not be scared. Ward is returned to deck
after 3 turns. Scare: 1, Distance: 4

name: Deadbolt
description: Prevent target from opening a chest next turn. Distance: 10, through walls.
